attributes.action: make Stamp Duty directly relate to the size of a property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current system of assessing Stamp Duty based on value of property is unfair on people living in areas where the price of property is higher, particularly in London where property prices are disproportionately higher than the rest of the UK. A fairer system would be to base Stamp Duty on square footage. This would make sure that the tax burden is shared equally.
